exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat sigma : name -> data p : packet H : pBody p = Lock Unable to unify "Prop" with "locks_correct_locked sigma p".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Lock -> locks_correct_locked sigma p

Premises:
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : name; pDst : name; pBody : msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
locks_correct_locked = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => pBody p = Locked -> exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments locks_correct_locked _%function_scope
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Inductive Msg : Set := Lock : Msg | Unlock : Msg | Locked : Msg
locked_in_flight_all_clients_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Locked -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct sigma -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false
locks_correct_unlock_sent_lock : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Lock -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p
locks_correct_locked_at_head : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) (c : Client_index), pDst p = Client c -> pBody p = Locked -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
unlock_in_flight_all_clients_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Unlock -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct sigma -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false
locks_correct_unlock_sent_locked : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Locked -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p
Record Decomposition (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) : Type := Build_Decomposition { state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop; network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant_sym : forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 ->...-> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) } Arguments Build_Decomposition _ _ (_ _ _ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
LockServ_network_invariant = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => locks_correct_unlock sigma p /\ locks_correct_locked sigma p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments LockServ_network_invariant _%function_scope
Build_Decomposition : forall (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) (state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop) (network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop) (network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop), (forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1) -> state_invariant init_handlers -> (forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')) ->...-> Decomposition B M
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_old : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' q : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant sigma q -> network_network_invariant p q -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_network_invariant p' q where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = h -> network_network_invariant p p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ps -> pSrc p = h -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
locks_correct_net_handlers : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st')
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_old : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p q : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant sigma q -> network_network_invariant p q -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') q where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
locks_correct_unlock = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => pBody p = Unlock -> exists c : Client_index, valid_unlock (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments locks_correct_unlock _%function_scope
state_invariant_maintained_deliver : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
locks_correct_unlock_input_handlers_old : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
locks_correct_true_at_head_of_queue : forall (sigma : name -> data) (x : Client_index), locks_correct sigma -> held (sigma (Client x)) = true -> at_head_of_queue sigma x
state_invariant_maintained_input : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
empty_queue_all_clients_false : forall sigma : name -> data, locks_correct sigma -> queue (sigma Server) = [] -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false
post_input_analyze_sent_packet : forall (h : name) (p : packet) (ms : list (name * msg)) (l : list packet), In p (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ms ++ l) -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms /\ h = pSrc p \/ In p l
locks_correct_update_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : Data) (x : Client_index), locks_correct sigma -> held st' = false -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client x) st')

```coq
intros sigma p H.
apply locks_correct_locked.
intros H0.
exists (Client_index 0).
apply valid_locked_intro.
apply queue_server_update_false.
apply H0.
apply locks_correct_unlock_sent_lock.
apply H.
Qed.

original: intros sigma p H. apply locks_correct_locked. intros H0. exists (Client_index 0). apply valid_locked_intro. apply queue_server_update_false. apply H0. apply locks_correct_unlock_sent_lock. apply H.
